song_name: Super Mario Galaxy - Gusty Garden Galaxy
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Super Mario Galaxy - Gusty Garden Galaxy is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Super Mario Galaxy - Gusty Garden Galaxy has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Mixolydian,  and D♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
